methods.description: Gets email validation information for an email address

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address to retrieve validation information

apiDescription: This API provides validation information for email addresses to aid in deliverability. Syntax, existence of mail servers, and other tests are run to ensure delivery. Additional demographics are provided for the email address as well, including identifying generic, vulgar, education, government, or other entity type email addresses.
